item.description:
This ritual will bless my place in Washington Square. Those who RSVP will get details of address, parking etc..

*********************************

Solstice Feast from 6-8 as we gather to welcome in the New Year. Â Bring something yummy to share which meets your own special needs. Then at 8 we will move into ritual space in the sacred place we create together. One block up from Washington Square so easy to get to by public transportation, and parking is available too. Space for about 12 women.
item.how_to_find_us: Those who RSVP will get details of address, parking etc..
item.name: Women's circle, Ritual honoring the Winter Solstice.
